content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump(position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill(position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a wooden chest(position x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Iron plate production at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of multiple stone furnaces at positions (x=40.0, y=-82.0), (x=45.0, y=-83.0), (x=42.0, y=-81.0), (x=45.0, y=-80.0), and (x=40.0, y=-79.0), each with a nearby wooden chest

### Lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)
Consists of a lab(position x=0.5, y=0.5) with nearby wooden chests at positions (x=0.5, y=2.5) and (x=2.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from entities
- Ensure the entity contains the item to be extracted before attempting extraction
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure the entity can accept the item to be inserted before attempting insertion
- Check the entity's inventory is not full before attempting insertion

### Errors when setting research
- Ensure the research technology is valid and available before attempting to set research

### Errors when using insert_item function
- Ensure the first argument is a Prototype before attempting insertion

### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure the burner inserter has fuel and is not waiting for source items before attempting insertion
